      • generateMap

        public Tile[][] generateMap(java.lang.String difficulty,
                   int biomeType)
        Generates the map. Takes a string represents a difficulty and the integer biome type. It first loops through the 2D tile array and initializes all the tiles. Then depending on the difficulty string calls generate resources and generates a map with varying numbers of resources.
        Parameters:
        difficulty -
        biomeType -
        Returns:

      • generateResources

        public void generateResources(int numResource,
                     int kindResource)
        Generates the resources and puts them on the map field.
        Parameters:
        numResource - Is a count of how many of this resource you want
        kindResource - Is a number representing what resource you want to place 1 is wood. 2 is water. 3 is food. 4 is gold.
